title.game.name: Baba Make Parabox
launch.debug: The program is currently in DEBUG MODE. disabling by changing options.
launch.game_mode.0: Other inputs will quit the game.
launch.open.levelpack: Please input levelpack's filename that you are going to open at below.
launch.open.levelpack.done: Successfully read the data of levelpack from file '{file}'.
launch.open.levelpack.empty.editor: If you leave it empty, the editor will create a new default levelpack.
launch.save.levelpack: Please input levelpack's filename that you are going to save at below.
launch.save.levelpack.done: Successfully saved the data of levelpack to file '{file}'.
launch.save.levelpack.empty.game: If you leave it empty, the game will not save your progress in the levelpack.
launch.save.levelpack.empty.editor: If you leave it empty, the editor will not save the levelpack you made.
launch.save.levelpack.empty.update: If you leave it empty, the game will overwrites the outdated data with the updated data in the levelpack file you choose for update.
launch.change_options.debug: Do you want to enable debug mode? [y/N]:
launch.change_options.performance: Rank your computer's performance from 1 to 5, and the game's display quality will be set up by your rank just input.
launch.change_options.display_layer:
Input the max depth layer number of space display.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND set this number lower than 3 due to performance.
The minimum value of this option is 0.
launch.change_options.long_press:
When you pressed a key long enough, The game would starts to repeat the action of this key.
These 2 values of durations below will be measured in milliseconds (1/1000 seconds).
launch.change_options.long_press.delay: The next value will be the time required for the key to start repeating.
launch.change_options.long_press.delay.d: If you don't need this function, please enter 0.
launch.change_options.long_press.interva: The next value will be the time interval between each two repetitions.
launch.change_options.json: Do you have any needs to edit the levelpack files? [y/N]:
launch.change_options.bgm: Do you like to have a background music? [y/N]:
launch.change_options.metatext: Enter metatext's max tier (commonly 1) if you do know what metatext is and you want it, or 0 if you really don't.
launch.change_options.done: The game options has been updated.
launch.exception: During the program running, an exception occur.
launch.exception.report: Please report this bug to the creator of this game.
launch.exception.record: The information of this exception will display below this line, So you should record all of them:
launch.keyboard_interrupt: Noticed that you pressed Ctrl+C, which tells terminal to shut this program.
launch.keyboard_interrupt.insert: Try Ctrl+Insert to copy texts next time.
